gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.records
Interface Record

All Known Subinterfaces:
IndexedFieldsRecord<T>, ModifiableIndexedFieldsRecord<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBaseRecord, Buffer, CsvRecord, SimpleRecord, StringIndexedCsvRecord
public interface Record

Record.

Method Summary
 String getBuffer()
          Gets the whole record as a String.
 byte[] getBytes()
          Gets the record contents as an array of bytes.
 void setBuffer(String arg)
          Sets the whole record.
 void setBytes(byte[] arg)
          Sets the whole record.
 void setCharset(Charset charset)
          Sets the charset used for the transformation String <--> byte[]
If this is not set the default Bo2 deployment text files charset should be used.
 

Method Detail

setBuffer

void setBuffer(String arg)
Sets the whole record.

Parameters:
arg - String that will assign its value to the record.

setBytes

void setBytes(byte[] arg)
Sets the whole record.

Parameters:
arg - Array of bytes that will assign its value to the record.

getBuffer

String getBuffer()
Gets the whole record as a String.

Returns:
Returns the record as a String

getBytes

byte[] getBytes()
Gets the record contents as an array of bytes.

Returns:
Returns the contents of the record as a byte array.

setCharset

void setCharset(Charset charset)
Sets the charset used for the transformation String <--> byte[]
If this is not set the default Bo2 deployment text files charset should be used. Note that the transformation is not necessarily symmetrical and the correct encoding should be used.

Parameters:
charset -
